p: Presently, the entire world is fighting againt COVID‐19 pandemic which is caused by SARS‐CoV‐2. This disease was first reported in the Hubai, China, in December 2019 and spreaded throughout the globe in a very short time. 1, 37a According to “WHO” as of 3 rd June 2020, the total number of confirmed COVID‐19 cases is approximately 6.27 million and 379 thousand deaths throughout the 216 countries in the world. At present, there is no effective drug available in the market to control the spread of COVID‐19. The researchers are working for the development of therapeutic drugs to treat infections.
